trends: There have been 63 other sightings in Fresno
There were no other sightings in Fresno on or around July 7th 1997
Summary: round floating silver ball with dark center
divs: Sighting Details was traveling south on rt 99 close to fresno ca.around 245 pm in july of 97 when i saw a silver ball with a dark center appear suddenlyto my right.it then floated over the hwy going right over my vehicle travelingto th northeast,picking up speed at a great rate.i then noticed 2 jets that tookoff from the airport that this thing crossed.the object was still visable 30seconds later when it crossed over the mountains 40 miles to the east with noappearant sonic boom.the 2 jets that took off i lost sight of.the object coverd40 miles in about 30 seconds.two years later 0n a ufo speacial on tv i saw avideo of the same object that i had observed.i did have a passanger at the timeof the sighting with me but he did not have his glasses.later on looking at themap it had gone in a direct line twords the nevada test sight outside of lasvegas where i had previously in 1989.
